definition: the net of justice/rigorous process of the law/the long arm of the law
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
The net of justice is wide, but no-one escapes.
pinyin: fa3 wang3 hui1 hui1 , shu1 er2 bu4 lou4

definition: it is hard to escape the net of justice (idiom)
to fall into the net of justice (idiom); finally arrested
It is hard to escape the dragnet of the law/the long arm of the law

sentences.english: He fled to Brazil trying to escape the long armof the law.
sentences.chinese: 他逃到巴西，企图逃避恢恢法网。

sentences.english: In Australia, the law finally got its man.
Federer is the French Open champion at last after beating Robin Soderling in straight sets at Roland Garros.
sentences.chinese: 费德勒直落三盘击败索德林，最终问鼎法网冠军。

sentences.english: That would have been an amazing accomplishment, to beat Rafa in the finals of the French Open.
sentences.chinese: 在法网决赛击败拉斐尔，那将会是非常了不起的成就。

sentences.english: With the help of the mill and Chris, the criminal finally fell into the net.
sentences.chinese: 在赛米尔和克里斯的帮助下，罪犯终于落入了法网。

sentences.english: The win over Amelie Mauresmo in Paris is one of my nicest sporting memories!
sentences.chinese: 也喜欢法网，在那里击败毛瑞斯莫是个美好回忆。

sentences.english: The safety net, or what remains of it, has been transformed into a dragnet.
sentences.chinese: 安全网，或者说它的剩余部分，已经演变成为了法网。

sentences.english: These lawless men will be caught in the toils of law sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这些不法之徒迟早会落入法网。

sentences.english: Justine Henin wins the French Open, but not Wimbledon.
I played against Ferrer, I played against Davydenko in the French Open.
sentences.chinese: 我打过费雷，法网对阵劳模。

sentences.english: Roger Federer of Switzerland has won the French Open Tennis Championship for the first time in his career.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士选手费德勒获得其职业生涯中首次法网公开赛。

sentences.english: The courts at the Frenc…h Open are. clay, which changes the way the ga. me is played.
sentences.chinese: 法网为红土场地，这也改变了比赛进行的状况。

sentences.english: Barcelona Ken yet again slipped through the law's fingers.
sentences.chinese: 在巴塞罗纳，肯又一次逃脱了法网。

sentences.english: I won't know my status for the French Open for a couple more days.
sentences.chinese: 但是还要再过些天，我才能知道我备战法网的状态。

sentences.english: The paper admittance matrix method for calculating reactive incremental transmission losses are derived in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对导纳矩阵法网损微增率算法进行了推导分析。

sentences.english: Oh, Soderling is also the only man ever to beat Nadal at the French. No big deal.
sentences.chinese: 索德林还是唯一在法网击败过纳达尔的人。

definition: Wimbledon Championships (tennis)/abbr. for 溫布爾登網球公開賽|温布尔登网球公开赛[Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4]
